english.segment1: We all like to hide behind our different faces. And we all like to pretend we're in different places. I don't need anyone to give me approval. And I don't mind if you laugh and call me a loser
english.segment2: 'Coz He's all I need. To live, to be. He's my decree. He's all I ever need
english.segment3: We all like to brave our faith when misplace it. And we all like to call up too so when I make it. But you and me, we don't need to beg or steal or borrow. 'Coz we are kids of the King, of the great tomorrow
english.segment4: He's all I need. To live, to be. He's my decree. He's all I ever need
english.segment5: Hope in Him, trust in Him, reach for Him. Let the flood of God's tears drown the sea. That should've never been, never been
english.segment6: He's all I need. To live, to be. He's my decree. He's all I ever need
